content.description: no real crux, just fun easy warm up of nothing but lots of chicken heads to sling. Rap off tree.
content.location: this route is directly adjacent of "Pro's Overrated"

content.description: fun moderate trad line, Crux is low and has an R rating because a fall from the first decent pro would result in a decking . DO NOT STAND ON THE LOW FLAKE THATS MARKED PHOTO! Bomber horizontal pro after flake  . SR to #2, tree rap from top.
content.protection: SR to #2 and tree rap.  POOR ROCK STRUCTURE ON MARKED FLAKE, AVOID USING!
content.location: This line is in the dihedral to the right of the overhang where the route "shining mountain" starts. easy and short walk on the trail.

content.description: This area faces west so the sun is off of you until late afternoon. Rock is great but the area is still underdeveloped so beware of poison ivy and little bushes that are the spawn of satan with all of their thorns. if you see the route "shining mountain 5.6" this area starts just right of the overhang.
